en: And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
hmr: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,

en: Speak unto all the congregation of the children of Israel, and say unto them, Ye shall be holy; for I Jehovah your God am holy.
hmr: “Israel thla, mipuihai po po chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘In inthieng ding a nih, kei LALPA in Pathien hi kân thieng sih a.

en: Ye shall fear every man his mother, and his father; and ye shall keep my sabbaths: I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: Mi tinin in nu le pa in ṭi ding a na; chun, ka châwlnihai chu in inser ding a nih; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Turn ye not unto idols, nor make to yourselves molten gods: I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: Milim tieng chun thle naw unla, milim sung fâwm pathienhai in ta dingin insiem naw ro; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: And when ye offer a sacrifice of peace-offerings unto Jehovah, ye shall offer it that ye may be accepted.
hmr: “LALPA kuoma inremna thilin- hlâna in inthâwi pha chun, pawm tlâk ni dingin in inhlân ding a nih.

en: It shall be eaten the same day ye offer it, and on the morrow: and if aught remain until the third day, it shall be burnt with fire.
hmr: In inhlân ni tak amanih, a zîng tûka mania fâk ding a na; ni thum chena um a la um chun raw ding a nih.

en: And if it be eaten at all on the third day, it is an abomination; it shall not be accepted:
hmr: Ni thum nia fâk a ni chun thil tirdakum a na, pawm ni naw nih,

en: but every one that eateth it shall bear his iniquity, because he hath profaned the holy thing of Jehovah: and that soul shall be cut off from his people.
hmr: chun, a fatu taphawt chun LALPA thil inthieng chu a suk- pawrche leiin a rîtlona maw chu phur a ta, ama chu a chipuihai laia inthawkin tuithlârin um lem a tih.

en: And when ye reap the harvest of your land, thou shalt not wholly reap the corners of thy field, neither shalt thou gather the gleaning of thy harvest.
hmr: “In loa bu dâm in sîk pha in lohnâwm kil rawt chenin in sîk ding a ni nawh a, lâk ṭhelhai chu pâwl tlâk hnungin in lâk khâwm ding a ni bawk nawh.

en: And thou shalt not glean thy vineyard, neither shalt thou gather the fallen fruit of thy vineyard; thou shalt leave them for the poor and for the sojourner: I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: In grêp huona lo ṭhelhai in zawng nâwk ding a ni nawh a, in grêp huona a ra ṭilhai in rût khâwm ding a ni bawk nawh; mi rimsihai le ram dang mihai in hlapêk ding a nih; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Ye shall not steal; neither shall ye deal falsely, nor lie one to another.
hmr: “Inru naw unla, mî hlêm naw unla, khêl hril bawk naw ro.

en: And ye shall not swear by my name falsely, and profane the name of thy God: I am Jehovah.
hmr: In Pathien hming hrilse dingin ka hming sâlin khêlin in inkhâm ding a ni nawh; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Thou shalt not oppress thy neighbor, nor rob him: the wages of a hired servant shall not abide with thee all night until the morning.
hmr: “I tuolbâwmhai i hnawchêp ding a ni nawh a, în rûkpêk ding a ni bawk nawh. Inhlawfa hlaw chu zânkhuoin a zînga chen i hrênpêk ding a ni nawh.

en: Thou shalt not curse the deaf, nor put a stumblingblock before the blind; but thou shalt fear thy God: I am Jehovah.
hmr: Nasêt chu ṭawngsie în phur ding a ni nawh a, mitdel hmaah inpal thlûkna i sie ding a ni bawk nawh; i Pathien chu i ṭi ding a ni lem; Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.

en: Ye shall do no unrighteousness in judgment: thou shalt not respect the person of the poor, nor honor the person of the mighty; but in righteousness shalt thou judge thy neighbor.
hmr: “Rorêlnaa chun fellotakin in rêl ding a ni nawh, mi rimsi chu i thlier ding a ni nawh a, mi thilthawthei în za chuong ding a ni bawk nawh, feltakin i tuolbâwm ro chu i rêlpêk ding a nih.

en: Thou shalt not go up and down as a talebearer among thy people: neither shalt thou stand against the blood of thy neighbor: I am Jehovah.
hmr: I chipuihai lai mihai hêkin în vâk vêl ruoi ding a ni nawh a, i tuolbâwm thisen thuah a ni naw zâwngin i ṭhang ding a ni bawk nawh; Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.

en: Thou shalt not hate thy brother in thy heart: thou shalt surely rebuke thy neighbor, and not bear sin because of him.
hmr: I lungrilin i unau i theida ding a ni nawh, i tuolbâwm chu i kâwk ngei ding a nih, a suolnaa în thiengna dingin.

en: Thou shalt not take vengeance, nor bear any grudge against the children of thy people; but thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself: I am Jehovah.
hmr: Phuba i lâk ding a ni nawh a, i chipuihai theidâna i pâi ding a ni bawk nawh a, nang le nang în hmangai angin i tuolbâwm chu i hmangai ding a ni lem: Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.

en: Ye shall keep my statutes. Thou shalt not let thy cattle gender with a diverse kind: thou shalt not sow thy field with two kinds of seed: neither shall there come upon thee a garment of two kinds of stuff mingled together.
hmr: “Ka thupêkhai in pawm ding a nih. I ran chu chi tum tum inthlatir naw rawh; i loah thlaichi chi hni chîng naw la, thil chi hni khâwng pawl puon i sil ding a ni bawk nawh.

en: And whosoever lieth carnally with a woman, that is a bondmaid, betrothed to a husband, and not at all redeemed, nor freedom given her; they shall be punished; they shall not be put to death, because she was not free.
hmr: “Tukhawm suoknu, pasal huol- tu nei, lân tlan lo, lân suoktir lo le zâl hmunkhat taphawt chu hrem nîng a ta, sukhlum chu ni êm naw nih a, ama chu insuo lo a la ni leiin.

en: And he shall bring his trespass-offering unto Jehovah, unto the door of the tent of meeting, even a ram for a trespass-offering.
hmr: Intuokna kawtkhâr bulah LALPA kuoma a bawsiet thâwina dingin, bawsiet thâwina berâmchal a hung kei ding a nih.

en: And the priest shall make atonement for him with the ram of the trespass-offering before Jehovah for his sin which he hath sinned: and the sin which he hath sinned shall be forgiven him.
hmr: Chun, a thil suksuol taha baw- siet inthâwina dingin thiempu chun berâmchalin LALPA hmaah intlanna siempêk a tih; chuongchun, a thil suksuolnaa chun ngaidam nîng a tih.

en: And when ye shall come into the land, and shall have planted all manner of trees for food, then ye shall count the fruit thereof as their uncircumcision: three years shall they be as uncircumcised unto you; it shall not be eaten.
hmr: “Ram chu in va hluoh a, fâk dinga theikûng chi tinrêng in phun pha chun, a ra chu in ta dinga thieng- nawah in ngai ding a nih; in ta dingin kum thum sûng chu inthieng nawa ngai ding a na, fâk dêr lo ding a nih.

en: But in the fourth year all the fruit thereof shall be holy, for giving praise unto Jehovah.
hmr: Amiruokchu, a kum li kum chun a ra po po chu suktum ding a nih a, LALPA inpâkna thilinhlân ding a nih.

en: And in the fifth year shall ye eat of the fruit thereof, that it may yield unto you the increase thereof: I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: A kum nga kum ruok chun, in ta dinga a pung pei theina dingin a ra chu in fâk ding a nih: Kei LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Ye shall not eat anything with the blood: neither shall ye use enchantments, nor practise augury.
hmr: “Ieng sa khawm a thisen pumin in fâk ding a ni nawh. Dawi dâm hmangin aisân dâm in ching ding a ni nawh.

en: Ye shall not round the corners of your heads, neither shalt thou mar the corners of thy beard.
hmr: I bekbawra inthawkin a vêlin i lu i vaw ding a ni nawh a, i khâkhmul a sîrtuokin i tan ding a ni bawk nawh.

en: Ye shall not make any cuttings in your flesh for the dead, nor print any marks upon you: I am Jehovah.
hmr: Mithi leiin in taksa in ât ding a ni nawh a, in inṭiel ding a ni bawk nawh; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Profane not thy daughter, to make her a harlot; lest the land fall to whoredom, and the land become full of wickedness.
hmr: Nawchizawra siem dingin i nau- nu chu sukpawrche naw rawh; ram chu uiretna ramah hung inchang a ta, rîtlonain hung sip rawi a tih.

en: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am Jehovah.
hmr: Ka châwlnihai chu in inser ding a na, ka hmun inthieng chu in inza ding a nih: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Turn ye not unto them that have familiar spirits, nor unto the wizards; seek them not out, to be defiled by them: I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: “Khawhri aisânthiem zâwlhai chu pan naw unla, dâwithiemhai khawm in pawrche phâna dingin zawng suok naw ro: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Thou shalt rise up before the hoary head, and honor the face of the old man, and thou shalt fear thy God: I am Jehovah.
hmr: “Lua kêlsam ṭohai hmaa chun i ngîr pei ding a na, tar hmêl chu în za ding a na, i Pathien chu i ṭi ding a nih; Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.

en: And if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land, ye shall not do him wrong.
hmr: “Ram dang mi in rama khawsa ve an um chun in sukse ding a ni nawh.

en: The stranger that sojourneth with you shall be unto you as the home-born among you, and thou shalt love him as thyself; for ye were sojourners in the land of Egypt: I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: Ram dang mi nangni laia khawsahai chu in ta dingin a ram mi ang hrim an ni ding a nih; nangma i înhmangai angin i hmangai ding a nih; nangni khawm Aigupta rama khan ram dang mi in ni kha: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.

en: Ye shall do no unrighteousness in judgment, in measures of length, of weight, or of quantity.
hmr: “Rorêl thua dâm, seizie in- khinaa dâm, bûknaa dâm, tamzie inkhinaa dâm indik nawtakin in thaw ding a ni nawh.

en: Just balances, just weights, a just ephah, and a just hin, shall ye have: I am Jehovah your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt.
hmr: Khâina indiktak, bûkna indik- tak, epha indiktak, hin indiktak in nei ngei ding a nih: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien, Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu ka nih.

en: And ye shall observe all my statutes, and all mine ordinances, and do them: I am Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, ka thupêkhai po po le ka rorêlhai po po chu zâwmin in thaw ding a nih: Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
